name: Possibly Related Recent Posts
author: Abu Ashraf Masnun

sections.description:
Automatically displays possibly related GAF projects under each post using a filter on the_content. List generated using the GAF API. Does NOT use tags.

Upgrade

  1. Delete the previous masnun-gaf folder from the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Upload the new masnun-gaf folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

Usage

  1. After activation, please use the “GAF Text Link Settings” submenu under the “Settings” menu in the left sidebar to configure your GAF username.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the masnun-gaf folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

NOTE: See “Other Notes” for Upgrade and Usage Instructions as well as other pertinent topics.

short_description: Puts possibly related GAF projects at the end of each post.
